item.description:
Let's have a fun night out! We'll start with dinner at the Waterstreet Cafe, a Mediterranean-themed restaurant in Fall River. I made a reservation for 7:30pm. Afterwards, we will move over to their bar area to see The Express, a fun band I have seen a few times (my co-worker is the keyboard player). The Express plays a mix of rock and popular cover tunes, and there is always a group of people dancing!

Website for Waterstreet Cafe: http://www.waterstree...
Parking is available on the street including in a semi-lot across the way. The area is a little tricky to get around in but it is right near Battleship Cove.
Website for The Express: http://www.myspace.co...

There is a $7 cover for the band, which goes on at 9:30. If you eat dinner in the restaurant first they will give you a drink coupon for the show, but you still need to pay the cover.

Please indicate in your reservation whether you are coming for dinner or just for the band. This is a joint event between the South Shore 30+ Singles Group, South Shore Hike, Bike, etc. group, and Wings. Please RSVP to ONE group.

I will send out my cell number the day before to YES replies. Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be at the entrance/Reservation under Trina

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Dinner and music with The Express in Fall River
